content: **from the pattern ** > an elegant airy stitch pattern and lacy border have fan-tastic appeal in this heirloom-worthy afghan stitch the squares one by one and crochet them together later squares are fan shaped and a bit off-kilter to form a swirled effect when joined together gauge row 1 and 2=1 5 was on episode 501 on interweave available as ebook with other patterns at interweave 1 ebook calls knitting only but there are also crochet patterns included 1 https //www interweave com/article/knitting/download-all-patterns-from-knitting-daily-tv-series-500/
